activities:
Covisint transfers data from the EU primarily for employee benefit and service administration, human resource management, stock program administration, corporate security and general corporate business processes. Limited customer data is transferred from the EU for product registration, support, internal sales, marketing and data processing. Personal data from some of our customers, their
European subsidiaries and their business partners and customers, is transferred to the US for processing messaging and data exchanges between and among European entities Business partners.
corpofftitle1: Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authoriries (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
